title: Subpart 383-9 - Closure, Post-Closure, and Institutional Control Requirements for Land Disposal Facilities
content:
Subpart 383-9 - Closure, Post-Closure, and Institutional Control Requirements for Land Disposal Facilities

State Regulations
§ 383-9.1 - Applicability
§ 383-9.2 - Closure plan requirements
§ 383-9.3 - Requirements for disposal unit closure
§ 383-9.4 - Requirements for facility closure
§ 383-9.5 - Additional facility closure requirements for above ground disposal
§ 383-9.6 - Additional facility closure requirements for underground mined repositories
§ 383-9.7 - Post-closure monitoring and maintenance
§ 383-9.8 - Institutional control
§ 383-9.9 - Post-institutional control requirements

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
